text: Tilden Santiago (13 June 1940 â€“ 2 February 2022) was a Brazilian politician and trade unionist. From 1991 to 2003, he was a member of the Chamber of Deputies. He later was Ambassador of Brazil to Cuba from 2003 to 2006. Santiago died from respiratory failure caused by COVID-19 in Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais on 2 February 2022 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Brazilian diplomats Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil Category:Trade unionists Category:Politicians from Minas Gerais
title: Tilden Santiago
